content.prompt: The work exemplifies a central concern of Northern European painting traditions in its inclusion of

choices.label: elements from different artistic traditions that reflect a diverse cultural identity
objects from everyday life that communicate deeper symbolic meaning
biblical scenes that were intended to illustrate Protestant doctrines
figures in classical attire and poses that represent humanist ideals

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or groups of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
